verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שָׁל֗וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Loosh, In the third לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <S%H3566><s%> le-Cho-resh of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> pa-Ras, of Persia דָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var a thing נִגְלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> nig-Lah was revealed לְדָֽנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> le-da-ni-Yel, unto Daniel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> nik-Ra was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֑ר <S%H1095><s%> be-le-te-shatz-Tzar; Belteshazzar וֶאֱמֶ֤ת <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met [was] true הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var and the thing וְצָבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> ve-tza-Va but the time appointed גָד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, [was] long וּבִין֙ <S%H995><s%> u-Vin and he understood אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, the thing וּבִ֥ינָה <S%H998><s%> u-Vi-nah and had understanding ל֖וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo בַּמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> bam-mar-'Eh. of the vision

בַּיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim In those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem; those אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I דָֽנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-yeL I Daniel הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti had been מִתְאַבֵּ֔ל <S%H56><s%> mit-'ab-Bel, was mourning שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <S%H7620><s%> sha-vu-'Im weeks יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. full

לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread חֲמֻד֞וֹת <S%H2530><s%> cha-mu-Dot beauty לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor אָכַ֗לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal-ti, I ate וּבָשָׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> u-va-Sar flesh וָיַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> va-Ya-yin nor wine לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> va neither came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about פִּ֖י <S%H6310><s%> pi in my mouth וְס֣וֹךְ <S%H5480><s%> ve-Soch neither did I anoint לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor סָ֑כְתִּי <S%H5480><s%> Sa-che-ti; myself at all עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until מְלֹ֕את <S%H4390><s%> me-Lot were fulfilled שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet till three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <S%H7620><s%> sha-vu-'Im weeks יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. whole פ Peh

וּבְי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom day עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah And in the four לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon; of the first וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, I הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti become עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al was by יַ֧ד <S%H3027><s%> yad as I was by the side הַנָּהָ֛ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har river הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol of the great ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu that חִדָּֽקֶל׃ <S%H2313><s%> chid-Da-kel. which [is] Hiddekel

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa Then I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָאֵ֔רֶא <S%H7200><s%> va-'E-re, and looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad and behold a certain לָב֣וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> la-Vush clothed בַּדִּ֑ים <S%H906><s%> bad-Dim; in linen וּמָתְנָ֥יו <S%H4975><s%> u-ma-te-Nav whose loins חֲגֻרִ֖ים <S%H2296><s%> cha-gu-Rim [were] girded בְּכֶ֥תֶם <S%H3800><s%> be-Che-tem with fine gold אוּפָֽז׃ <S%H210><s%> 'u-Faz. of Uphaz

וּגְוִיָּת֣וֹ <S%H1472><s%> u-ge-vi-ya-To His body כְתַרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> che-tar-Shish, also [was] like the beryl וּפָנָ֞יו <S%H6440><s%> u-fa-Nav and his face כְּמַרְאֵ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'Eh as the appearance בָרָק֙ <S%H1300><s%> va-Rak of lightning וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nav and his eyes כְּלַפִּ֣ידֵי <S%H3940><s%> ke-lap-Pi-dei as lamps אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, of fire וּזְרֹֽעֹתָיו֙ <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-ro-'o-Tav and his arms וּמַרְגְּלֹתָ֔יו <S%H4772><s%> u-mar-ge-lo-Tav, and his feet כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> ke-'Ein like in colour נְחֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet brass קָלָ֑ל <S%H7044><s%> ka-Lal; to polished וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the voice דְּבָרָ֖יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav of his words כְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ke-Kol like the voice הָמֽוֹן׃ <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon. of a multitude

וְרָאִיתִי֩ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'i-Ti alone saw אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I דָנִיֵּ֤אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel And I Daniel לְבַדִּי֙ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Di alone אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּרְאָ֔ה <S%H4759><s%> ham-mar-'Ah, the vision וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim for the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi, with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U that were with me saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּרְאָ֑ה <S%H4759><s%> ham-mar-'Ah; not the vision אֲבָ֗ל <S%H61><s%> 'a-Val, but חֲרָדָ֤ה <S%H2731><s%> cha-ra-Dah quaking גְדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah a great נָפְלָ֣ה <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lah fell עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, on וַֽיִּבְרְח֖וּ <S%H1272><s%> vai-yiv-re-Chu upon them so that they fled בְּהֵחָבֵֽא׃ <S%H2244><s%> be-he-cha-Ve. to hide

וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <S%H7604><s%> nish-'Ar-ti Therefore I was left alone לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Di, alone וָֽאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh, and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּרְאָ֤ה <S%H4759><s%> ham-mar-'Ah vision הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah this great הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, yet וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no נִשְׁאַר־ <S%H7604><s%> nish-'ar- and there remained בִּ֖י bi כֹּ֑ח <S%H3581><s%> Koch; no strength וְהוֹדִ֗י <S%H1935><s%> ve-ho-Di, in me for my comeliness נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> neh-Pach was turned עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai unto לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <S%H4889><s%> le-mash-Chit, in me into corruption וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <S%H6113><s%> 'a-Tzar-ti and I retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach. no strength

וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> va-'esh-Ma' Yet heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol I the voice דְּבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav; of his words וּכְשָׁמְעִי֙ <S%H8085><s%> u-che-sha-me-'I and when I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice דְּבָרָ֔יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav, of his words וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, I הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti become נִרְדָּ֥ם <S%H7290><s%> nir-Dam then was I in a deep sleep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai on my face וּפָנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> u-fa-Nai and my face אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. toward the ground

וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- behold יָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> yad And behold an hand נָ֣גְעָה <S%H5060><s%> Na-ge-'ah touched בִּ֑י Bi; וַתְּנִיעֵ֥נִי <S%H5128><s%> vat-te-ni-'E-ni me which set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and בִּרְכַּ֖י <S%H1290><s%> bir-Kai me upon my knees וְכַפּ֥וֹת <S%H3709><s%> ve-chap-Pot and [upon] the palms יָדָֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai. of my hands

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֡י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel unto me O Daniel אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- a man חֲ֠מֻדוֹת <S%H2530><s%> Cha-mu-dot beauty הָבֵ֨ן <S%H995><s%> ha-Ven understand בַּדְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> bad-de-va-Rim the words אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that אָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I am דֹבֵ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> do-Ver that I speak אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about וַעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> va-'a-Mod unto thee and stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto עָמְדֶ֔ךָ <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-De-cha, unto me I stood כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah have now שֻׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> shul-Lach-ti for unto thee am I now sent אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha; to you וּבְדַבְּר֥וֹ <S%H1696><s%> u-ve-dab-be-Ro And when he had spoken עִמִּ֛י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this word הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this עָמַ֥דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> 'a-Mad-ti and stand מַרְעִֽיד׃ <S%H7460><s%> mar-'Id. trembling

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַי֮ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra he unto me Fear דָנִיֵּאל֒ <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-yeL not Daniel כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom day הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, for from the first אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you נָתַ֧תָּ <S%H5414><s%> na-Ta-ta that thou didst set אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לִבְּךָ֛ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha thine heart לְהָבִ֧ין <S%H995><s%> le-ha-Vin to understand וּלְהִתְעַנּ֛וֹת <S%H6031><s%> u-le-hit-'an-Not and to chasten לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei thyself before אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> nish-me-'U were heard דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rei-cha; thy words וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-ni- and I בָ֖אתִי <S%H935><s%> Va-ti and I am come בִּדְבָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> bid-va-Rei-cha. for thy words

וְשַׂ֣ר׀ <S%H8269><s%> ve-Sar But the prince מַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4438><s%> mal-Chut of the kingdom פָּרַ֗ס <S%H6539><s%> pa-Ras, of Persia עֹמֵ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med withstood לְנֶגְדִּי֙ <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Di about עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twenty וְאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad me one י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, days וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold מִֽיכָאֵ֗ל <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El, but lo Michael אַחַ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad one הַשָּׂרִ֥ים <S%H8269><s%> has-sa-Rim princes הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-sho-Nim of the chief בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came לְעָזְרֵ֑נִי <S%H5826><s%> le-'a-ze-Re-ni; to help וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I נוֹתַ֣רְתִּי <S%H3498><s%> no-Tar-ti me and I remained שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel there with מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei the kings פָרָֽס׃ <S%H6539><s%> fa-Ras. of Persia

וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ti Now I am come לַהֲבִ֣ינְךָ֔ <S%H995><s%> la-ha-Vi-ne-cha, to make thee understand אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of what יִקְרָ֥ה <S%H7136><s%> yik-Rah what shall befall לְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-me-Cha thy people בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> be-'a-cha-Rit in the latter הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim; days כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od yet חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> cha-Zon for yet the vision לַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> lai-ya-Mim. [is] for [many] days

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <S%H1696><s%> u-ve-dab-be-Ro And when he had spoken עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi, with כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> kad-de-va-Rim such words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; to these נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti unto me I set פָנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nai my face אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah toward the ground וְנֶאֱלָֽמְתִּי׃ <S%H481><s%> ve-ne-'e-La-me-ti. and I became dumb

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh, and behold כִּדְמוּת֙ <S%H1823><s%> kid-Mut And behold [one] like the similitude בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of men נֹגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> no-Ge-a' touched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שְׂפָתָ֑י <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tai; my lips וָאֶפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> va-'ef-tach- then I opened פִּ֗י <S%H6310><s%> Pi, my mouth וָאֲדַבְּרָה֙ <S%H1696><s%> va-'a-dab-be-Rah and spake וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to him הָעֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-Med unto him that stood לְנֶגְדִּ֔י <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Di, before אֲדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni, before me O my lord בַּמַּרְאָה֙ <S%H4759><s%> bam-mar-'Ah by the vision נֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <S%H2015><s%> ne-hef-Chu are turned צִירַי֙ <S%H6735><s%> tzi-Rai my sorrows עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <S%H6113><s%> 'a-Tzar-ti upon me and I have retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach. no strength
